import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";
import StatusCodes from "@theme/StatusCodes";
import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";
import TabItem from "@theme/TabItem";
import Heading from "@theme/Heading";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Update an API key"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/keys/{keyId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates an existing API key changing its name, permissions, and status.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"keyId","in":"path","description":"The unique identifier of the API key to update.","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","example":"75a5f745-f697-4418-b38d-0fe0d277e258"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"description":"The request parameters for updating an existing API key.","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"name":{"maxLength":30,"minLength":0,"type":"string","description":"The new name for the API key.","nullable":true,"example":"Winfield Upton"},"permissions":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"},"description":"The new list of permissions for the API key.","nullable":true,"example":["some text"]},"isActive":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates whether the API key should be active or not.","nullable":true,"example":true}},"additionalProperties":false,"description":"The request parameters for updating an existing API key.","title":"UpdateApiKeyRequest"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Update optional params for user api keys","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"response":{"type":"boolean"},"count":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"links":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"href":{"type":"string"},"action":{"type":"string"}}}},"status":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"},"statusCode":{"type":"integer","format":"int32"}},"title":"BooleanWrapper"}}}},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
